title: St. Louis Mayor Backs Middle Class Tax Cut Framework | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 08, 2010

 



St. Louis Mayor Backs Middle Class Tax Cut Framework





	Statement in a blog post:
http://mayorslay.com/blog/post.php?postID=17312
	Posted: Wednesday, December 08, 2010

President Obama And Congress

	Not everyone got what exactly they wanted from this weekâ€™s agreement between President Obama and Congressional leaders, but I believe that most of us got enough. That is the definition of a good compromise.

	Reforming the complex regulations of the alternative minimum tax is a good thing. Extending the tax cuts is a good thing. Reducing the payroll tax is a good thing. And extending unemployment benefits is a good thing. Taken together, they should stimulate the economy by encouraging the creation of new businesses in the near future, and sustain for a while longer those most affected by the current business climate.

	I strongly applaud the president for making the deal.
